i hope to someday compete professionally or atleast qualify for an event.

content.text: Hi there!
Hello!
My name is (user 1's name) and I am 10 years old.
Nice to meet you! I'm (user 2's name) and I'm 21.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play piano, guitar, and bowl.
That sounds fun! I used to go bowling with my parents when I was younger.
I hope to someday compete professionally or at least qualify for an event.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll do great.
Thank you! I appreciate that.
What kind of music do you like to play on the piano?
I like to play all sorts of music, but I especially enjoy playing classical music.
That's cool! I like to listen to classical music sometimes.
I'm glad to hear that!
What's your favorite song to play on the piano?
I don't really have a favorite song, but I really enjoy playing Chopin's Nocturne in E-flat major.
That's a beautiful song! I've heard it before and I love it.
Thank you! It's one of my favorites as well.
Do you play any other instruments besides the piano?
Yes, I also play guitar.
That's awesome! I used to play guitar when I was younger, but I haven't played in a while.
You should start playing again! It's a lot of fun.
I might have to do that! I miss playing it.
You should
